dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2310 IS: National Education Association Charter Repeal Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Blackburn (for herself and Ms. Lummis) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To repeal the Federal charter for the National Education Association.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the National Education Association Charter Repeal Act.

section.header: Repeal of Federal charter to the National Education Association

subsection.text: Chapter 1511 of title 36, United States Code (which granted a Federal charter to the National Education Association), is repealed.
The table of chapters for title 36, United States Code, is amended by striking the items relating to chapter 1511.
